lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: Our family wants to support economic development and we trust the good people asking for support in order to help their families and communities.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I have enough to share.
lender.occupational_info: I weave fabric for household use

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: The joy of helping someone raise themselves out of poverty vastly outweighs the pennies I would receive in interest

lender.name: Naomi
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing resources around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a firm that helps community-run early childhood education services look after children

lender.name: Wade
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with an abundance that I can share. If my small contribution will make a difference in someone else's life, then it is worth any risk I might assume.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: People have helped me financially when I needed help so I know personally the difference a small loan can make. Currently, I'm fortunate to have a good job in Canada and am glad to be able to share with others now.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I am inspired that very deserving people all over the world are working hard to improve their lives. I want and need to help them.
lender.occupational_info: I support new product development and deployment for my company.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I live in a country the where oppurtunities are plentiful. And I want that for everyone. I feel the only way to bring peace to the world is to bring prosperity within reach of every human. I feel great respect for those who are trying to lift themselves up, and for Kiva who does so without expecting a profit in return. The money I lend will mean very little to my life, but could mean a great deal to someone else who does not have the chances in life I do. If I never see this money again, it doesn't matter to me in the least. I am thankful for the chance to provide even the tiniest amount of help to those who have the confidence to stand up and ask for it.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large communication company called Verizon. I work on the telephone, helping people fix problems with their computer, their telephone, and their television.

lender.name: Ted
lender.loan_because: it\'s the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: My agency provides drinking water to many people.

lender.name: Jonathan and Jessica
lender.loan_because: We love Mexico!

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: This is an amazing business/grassroots model, and it is an easy way to help deserving entrepreneurs around the world. It's not charity; the business owners are helping their local economies and working toward self-sufficiency.

lender.name: Linn
lender.loan_because: I support others who own a business in the craft industries.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people to embroider and create designs for embroidery

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: We should all try to help if we can.

lender.name: hugh
lender.loan_because: These loans help people build better lives.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I like to support and connect with people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Yoga is exercise that helps you become stronger and more flexible, to breathe deeply and relax. It helps you stay balanced and healthy physically, emotionally and spiritually.

lender.name: Jacinta Patterson
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. Poverty should not be hereditary.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I am very fortunate and would like others to have an opportunity to create a life that makes them proud.
lender.occupational_info: Through my position as the human resources director, I give people jobs and help them succeed in a business environment.

lender.name: Tami
lender.loan_because: I believe in microfinance. I believe the only way to fix the big problems in the world is through targeted action at a local and even individual level. So I\'m putting my money where my mouth is.

lender.name: Jeff & Lisa
lender.loan_because: It's the just thing to do.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Helping others to help themselves is a good thing.

lender.name: Evan Sylliaasen
lender.loan_because: I may not be wealthy and currently am not making too much of a income at the moment but I know that I am definatly better off than most people in other countries. I have the drive to someday own my own business with my girlfriend and if there was no way to get a business loan in Washington state, I would have to rely on something like Kiva, therefor I feel that it is my part to help out as many people as I possibly can. I love to help people succeed in life and live the way they deserve and I believe Kiva helps peoples dreams come true everyday.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently attending college to become a graphic designer. In other words I am an artist, a painter, I love to draw, I use computer programs to make and design graphics and art pieces to sell someday.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.occupational_info: Quiropráctico en Madrid

lender.name: adeola
lender.loan_because: To build my music career(recording my songs)so that i can finance my humanitarian project.
lender.occupational_info: The world of entertainment.making money and appealing to the young people for peace through my music, and my n.g.o (refuge humanirian foundation.

lender.name: Selva
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe in the concept of Micro Financing and helping individuals who strive so hard to succeed.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: What would the world be without entrepreneurs?
lender.occupational_info: Well, I try my best to build a sustainable business by pleasing my clients. I love what I do and feel I'm changing the world.

lender.name: Brown
lender.loan_because: we believe in creating business opportunities for people.

lender.name: Agnes
lender.occupational_info: I teach English.

lender.name: Faun Raina
lender.loan_because: It bridges the geography that separates me from my world wide peers. Economic stability is the core foundation to a peaceful society. Lending allows those with the power to lift their regional economies to do so. Plus it just makes me feel good.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage people with few resources to launch a business.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from teaching and other work. I now serve on the Board of the United Nations Associatiion - Natonal Capital area. That fine organization supports a strong UN and also economic development around the world.

lender.name: Todd Beckett
lender.loan_because: I am.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers everyday. I believe that the promise of technology is even more important in the developing world, than the developed world.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: I want to share in the lives of others around the world who inspire me with their courage, perseverance and vision.

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: I care about people trying to help themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I prepare healthy, hopefully delicious, food for families and parties.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I am a Christian, and I believe it is something Jesus Christ would do.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: love is like a magic penny
lender.occupational_info: i help people follow and make health care laws & run a small business that helps teenagers

lender.name: Meg
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of one individual\'s actions and imprint on the world. The internet is an amazing way to forge useful and sincere connections between disparate pursuits and resources, and to bring together like-minded people to help a common cause.
lender.occupational_info: An all-female-owned Editorial Services corporation that provides writing, proofreading and other content services to a wide array of customers.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.occupation: university student and sports store employee

lender.name: Rob Guzman
lender.loan_because: It is my duty to help my fellow man.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I believe that individuals directly helping each other whenever possible is the best way to learn, grow and accomplish.
lender.occupational_info: For forty-one years I taught English in high school. For thirty of those years I taught non-English speaking students very new to the US and very eager to work hard and succeed.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: helping to build the world's first online philanthropic marketplace

lender.name: Ryan & Nicole
lender.loan_because: I care... and my wife took Swahili in college
lender.occupational_info: I represent poeple who have been hurt or taken advantage of and try to make them complete again

lender.name: Spurr family
lender.loan_because: We're blessed by God.
lender.occupational_info: many hours away from family.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I am able
lender.occupational_info: Ninatoa shauri kwa biashara kubwa, lakini mwaka uliopita nilikaa Afrika ya Mashariki (Tanzania na Kenya) na nilisaidia biashara ndogo ndogo vijijini - mmefanya vizuri!

lender.name: Zenzele & Jahzara
lender.loan_because: I am the change I wish to see in the world...

lender.name: Kennesaw State SIFE
lender.loan_because: We see this as one of the best ways of supporting the Millennium Development Goals. One person at a time!
lender.occupational_info: We are a University Students in Free Enteprise team and our mission is to teach and support free enterprise throughout the world.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: student

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I believe entrepreneurship is the way forward. We got our own startup off the ground via angel investors. I'm certainly not rich but given how far so little can go it seems only right to be an angel investor for someone else trying to start a business.
lender.occupational_info: Imagine difficult activities that take you two days to complete- for instance retrieving water from a far away well. What if that task could be magically reduced to under a minute! We do that for people with complicated computer programs.

lender.name: Carmen
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to be able to. It gives me joy.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that helps people send money home to their families, using the Internet.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Those who ask should receive.
lender.occupational_info: Just a cowboy with a couple hundred acres of land, a half dozen horses, a couple dozen cattle and other critters. Natural Horsemanship has helped shape my lift including helping those who ask for help.

lender.name: jeff
lender.loan_because: The world Can be better without Government intervention
lender.occupational_info: I work so the Government can waste my money

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I like to help when I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a photography student at the San Francisco Art Institute. I love taking photos of people and connecting with new individuals.

lender.name: Katherine and Luke
lender.loan_because: We feel like everybody deserves a chance to build something for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We read books and screenplays and try to find stories that would make good movies.

lender.name: Jackson
lender.loan_because: My uncles gave me a Kiva gift certificate for my first Christmas. You can never be too young to help others.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I have my own business and know that it takes a lot to get started. I also want to give back to others as many people gave me opportunity when I was getting started
lender.occupational_info: I am director of an agency that provides therapy to children and adults with developmental disabilities

lender.name: brian
lender.loan_because: i believe in people to create their own success.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part!

lender.name: Peter Harborow
lender.loan_because: i want to help make people successful
lender.occupational_info: Software sales professional, selling computer software

lender.name: Yamini
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Benoit
lender.loan_because: Because I can
lender.occupational_info: I\'m an engineer working on internet related technologies.

lender.name: Hope
lender.loan_because: I loan because I am blessed and I want to share those blessings with other members of my Human Family. I am constantly in awe of the courage it takes to reach out beyond the lives we've been 'handed' to create BETTER lives for our selves and our families. These Kiva proprietors and business people have that courage and I am proud to be a small part of their journey.
lender.occupational_info: I am a life coach and it is my passion to help people empower their lives.I also work in the theatre as a director and teacher to educate, enlighten and entertain. I am a fourth generation theatre artist.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I started my own business with borrowed money from someone who had faith in my abilities. I believe that faith in others is the real currency that helps entrepreneurs succeed.

lender.name: Nico
lender.loan_because: I have a really nice life. I am grateful for all that I have. I want to share and make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I set-up large conferences, places that people go to learn and share ideas on specific topics. It is engaging, rewarding, and fun.

lender.name: Curt
lender.loan_because: I believe in the concept of micro-credit. This is a terrific and easy way to help out people who are in need. Thanks, Kiva, for making this possible!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a hospital near Seattle, USA. I'm an artist, writer, photographer, videographer and graphic designer.

lender.name: Victor & Sara
lender.loan_because: We believe in the entrepreneurial spirit, and are encouraged to see these individuals making an effort to provide a better life for themselves, their families, and their communities. Our hat's off to all of them!
lender.occupational_info:
Victor: Works with IT Project Managers to make sure that new hardware and applications are implemented safely and securely. Sara: Writes procedures for Contact Center reps to follow to address client questions and problems.
We work for the same bank.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to be in need of money, and how much a really loan means. I think it's great to be able to help someone else in such a little way!
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer programmer for an insurance company where I analyze, develop, code, & test programs that maintaing the insurance auto system.

lender.name: Subhash
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who help themselves.

lender.name: Luke Byrne
lender.loan_because: I have set up and run my own web development business then got out of it in early 2006. I am about to embark on setting up another venture in the coming months. Cash flow is vital, so I lend.
lender.occupational_info: Bit of this, bit of that, all in the online space.

lender.name: angie
lender.loan_because: 'Money is like manure; it's not worth a thing unless it's spread around encouraging young things to grow.'

lender.name: Christy
lender.loan_because: It feels like extending a hand across the world.
lender.occupational_info: teacher

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I believe in the concept of a hand up rather than a handout.
lender.occupational_info: Retired - hobbies: cars and computers/internet

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because:
Sharing make us stronger.

C'est le partage qui fait la force.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: A little money from me can do a lot in another place.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired and love to travel. This is a way to keep in touch with the world.

lender.name: Natalia and Stefan
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in someones life. Hard work is always compensated and we want to see all these individuals succeed with their business. \"Today is for you and tomorrow it will me for me\".

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Helping people establish themselves helps spawn a cycle of prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mergers and acquisitions attorney. I help companies come together, change their structure and/or separate.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: After travelling in South America, I want to help people reach their small business goals through organizations like Kiva. I help because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a small college in the library as the Image Specialist, which means I help people find and use images in their studies.

lender.name: Albert
lender.loan_because: Why not? Its a great concept and the right thing to do.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: Nothing will change until we all take individual action.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the govenment providing services to people in my community.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I think our small loans can make a direct improvement to someone\'s life. This seems a responsible use of our fortunate status as first-world citizens. As Christians, we have a duty to be good stewards, and this can be one way to fill that duty.

lender.name: Filip
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the right to pursue their own destiny.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: To share.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: I'm in a position to be able to help others achieve their hopes and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Procurement and Subcontracts Management group for a world-wide engineering/construction company.

lender.name: steve
lender.loan_because: Jesus taught that Christians have a responsibility to help those in need-- those less fortunate than ourselves. Americans, even the poorest Americans, are very rich in comparison to the rest of the world. Providing financial handouts, while necessary in emergency situations, is a short term solution at best. Lending money to those who have the intention and ability to pay it back is biblical and leaves the borrower with a sense of dignity all humans deserve.
lender.occupational_info: My work is to lead as many people as possible to know Jesus Christ and how to receive an eternal life in heaven.

lender.name: Helle H. Christensen
lender.loan_because: It makes sence.

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to use computer software.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Being a small part of a greater good and a great way for a global community to come together.

lender.name: Thomas Huusom
lender.occupational_info: Typing in an endless sequence of numbers, split by a coffee break now and then.

lender.name: Lucas
lender.loan_because: It seems like a good investment vehicle both morally and financially.
lender.occupational_info: I am a photographer. I take pictures of people, places and things and sell them to people who need or want them.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: It's great to help in a small way for others to achieve their objectives personnally and in business.
lender.occupational_info: Family-run Coffee and Patisserie (cakes!) Shop owner in tourist town by the sea. I get to do the paperwork!

lender.name: Helena
lender.loan_because: Other women's stories touch me. I want to help them and their families.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I didn't even know about Kiva until my dear friend Joel gave me a gift of money to invest through Kiva. It's a meaningful gift that keeps on giving, and I intend to continue the giving for as long as I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist and designer (brochures, logos, posters, catalogs, annual reports, etc.), but also do web design work. I am most interested in working with clients involved in the visual and performing arts, publishing and small businesses and organizations that promote positive change in their communities.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I can give and give and give.
lender.occupational_info: I help children in the US learn to read and write.

lender.name: Fabeku
lender.loan_because: At the end of the day, we're all connected. And when one person finds goodness, we all find goodness.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: Investment Purposes
lender.occupational_info: Computer Consulting

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: Charity is one thing - loans are another.

lender.name: Cesar
lender.loan_because: I have been truly blessed in this life, and I believe it is an honor & a duty to help others in need.

lender.name: The Mosio Project
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference through The Mosio Project by helping small business owners in mobile services and transportation, two industries that connect people.
lender.occupational_info:
Mosio is a mobile software and solutions company specializing in text messaging and the mobile web. We enable businesses and organizations to have high value information exchanges with their customers and members on mobile devices.
Mosio simplifies mobile.

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: I feel this is a way to serve the global community, one individual at a time and in a very practical way. As an entrepreneur myself (even living in a privileged economy - North America)... I know how difficult starting up a business can be. I\'m so excited to be a small part of making that process a little easier for somebody else.
lender.occupational_info: I take photographs, and make artwork for people.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: This is amazingly beatutiful. Any econ student should know this. It gives dignity, along with oportunity and the incentive for creativity.
lender.occupational_info: If you have a job that is challenging in a country other than the US. I would like my job to be working for you.

lender.name: Shelby
lender.loan_because: I've lived in East Africa and seen the unbelievable effects of microfinance and Kiva with my own eyes. I like loaning because it's not giving someone a handout - just giving them a hand.
lender.occupational_info: I help ensure that the hard earned dollars that are loaned through Kiva make it safely to the entrepreneurs across the world, and that the money is also reliably repaid to those lenders.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: This organization is so awesome because it allows me to know to whom my money is actually going and to be part of this person\\\'s vision for success.
lender.occupational_info: I am a creative spiritual teacher. I lead workshops for women around the themes of writing, spirituality and the creative process that are unique, empowering and lots of fun! I also paint tons of Buddhas, angels, shamans and chickens.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Computer artist

lender.name: Eraj
lender.loan_because: Kiva helps bridge the gap between deficit and excess.
lender.occupational_info: Lubricating the wheels of commerce

lender.name: Mary Ann & Richard
lender.occupation: Retired social work & internet software manager
lender.loan_because: We believe that sharing our good fortune is the path to peace.
lender.occupational_info: Richard counseled people in crisis. Mary Ann made technology easier to understand.

lender.name: Peace Lutheran
lender.loan_because: We believe that empowering women will change the world, one step at a time.
lender.occupational_info: We are a Peace and Justice group that meets monthly to support efforts to reduce poverty, hunger and injustice, at home and around the world.

lender.name: Brad Marshall
lender.loan_because: every little bit helps
lender.occupational_info: I create websites like this one

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by the hard working people who I lend to.
lender.occupational_info: I work with kids who do not have a stable family. We find adult volunteers in our community who can be a consistent and trusted friend and guide to these kids because they need caring adults in their lives just like any youth.

lender.name: Goodfootin
lender.loan_because: I am thrilled to provide an opportunity for someone who is working to improve their life, and all they need is a small loan from me.
lender.occupational_info: I teach World History to 16 year old school kids.

lender.name: WomenWithTude
lender.loan_because: It feels good.
lender.occupational_info: I try to raise two little boys to be good world citizens.

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: I'm a firm believer in the power of Karma!
lender.occupational_info: I sell newly constructed homes and condominiums (apartments).

lender.name: John Hudson
lender.loan_because: I want to give people the opportunity to deliver the pride that self sufficiency brings to themselves and thier family.
lender.occupational_info: I sell cardboard boxes accross the globe

lender.name: Smileyblueyes
lender.loan_because: I can. I am a mother of five, and am grateful for the blessings in my life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher, for more than 20 years. I teach children with disabilities or learning problems. I love to see children smile.

lender.name: Rashke
lender.loan_because: Why not?

lender.name: Ariel
lender.loan_because: I was inspired by the story of Muhammad Yunus. I think microcredit is a brilliant concept and I love being able to take part.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I love being able to help people all across the globe, and I love that once one person has gotten their loan and repaid it, I can turn around and help someone else.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: When I have needed help, God has always provided. I do this out of love for God who has given to me, that others might be blessed too.

lender.name: Millicent
lender.loan_because: I was born and raised in Kenya. I have seen the suffering people go through. I know how they struggle to put up businesses and projects which enable them put food on the table and educate their children. If the small amount i loan will help alleviate poverty, then i am glad to help.

lender.name: T. Spetz
lender.loan_because: I like to help others less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: IT

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: We are one community, one family on this planet and we need to honor our connection through all the ways of love, compassion and respect.
lender.occupational_info: I am the co-founder of Morning Star, a Center for Change. We help to facilitate the growth of the human spirit through counseling, energy work, yoga, meditation, and teaching many classes on spirituality.

lender.name: Jukka
lender.loan_because: I want to put my money into good use.

lender.name: mohamed
lender.loan_because: l 27 year ,l am algerian,l not know english very good,l know frensh and arabic\r\n
lender.occupational_info: -l ned in credit to \"us$20,000\" or more for make commercial project her in algeria \r\n-l\'d like you to borow me this credit urgent,and l promise you to give your money back be for the end to 48 monthe.\r\n-l\'d like to receive this credit within-february-25-2007 please.

lender.name: Thirdwatch
lender.loan_because: I want to see other people succeed. What goes around, comes around.
lender.occupational_info: Look after my two children, and home.

lender.name: Wyatt
lender.loan_because: i like people.
lender.occupational_info: i entertain audiences in the theater.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: I have long wanted to support people in creating opportunities that are scaled to their needs and desires - and Kiva makes that possible.
lender.occupational_info: I support companies in determining the most effective ways to engage with the environment and sustainable development.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: Being born in the USA I have been very blessed from birth. I am disabled and do not have a lot but anyone can find something to give. God's Blessings....
lender.occupational_info: I am disabled and can not work. I am a House Husband / Father.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help other entrepreneurs establish business
lender.occupational_info: I consult, train and develop entrepreneurs

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs the chance to feel accomplishment..
lender.occupational_info: Selling Technology Products

lender.name: Elda
lender.loan_because: I can. :)
lender.occupational_info: I work for an organization that provides free lessons in art, music, dance and drama to 12,000 children, as part of their school day.

lender.name: J.T. & Family
lender.loan_because: We desire to be part of the Global Community. Even if we can only play a small role the influence in somebody\'s life could be extraordinary. The efforts of Kiva and their partners brings hope and there is no greater power in life than hope.
lender.occupational_info: We respect hard work and selflessness, and embrace those who are willing to chase their dreams. Good luck and God bless-

lender.name: Jorgen & André
lender.loan_because: I believe that the combination of microfinance and entrepeneurship will create an accelerated path out of poverty
lender.occupational_info: I create, develop and raise funds for companies.

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: I want to learn about businesses in other parts of the world, and do my part to help them succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I review the accounting and business processes of companies to help them improve their way of doing business.

lender.name: Cori & Charles
lender.loan_because: These loans are made in honor of my Dad, who worked hard to raise our family. Microlending is an economic miracle, and one of the simplest ways I have seen to redistribute wealth and share resources, especially for women around the globe ( the backbones of the earth), who only need a little help to lift themselves up.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people to help them repair their relationships with themselves, others and the world, thus bringing the shared dream of peace, justice and harmony on earth that much closer.

lender.name: Jo-Anne and Mark
lender.loan_because: While Mark was on a peacekeeping mission in Africa he saw, first hand, the importance of allowing people to to gain independence through having their own business. Living in Canada affords us the opportunity to help others. Kiva is one such way.
lender.occupational_info: Mark is an officer in the Canadian Navy.

lender.name: Carter Zoe Char Dad
lender.loan_because: I want peoples dreams to come true (Char 9 yrs old). I want to share our prosperity (Carter 12 yrs old). We are so lucky and I want to share the joy that comes from that.(Zoe 10 yrs old)

lender.name: DaleLynn
lender.loan_because: This is an incredibly easy, affordable and gratifying way to be a part of the solution. There is really no reason NOT to do this.
lender.occupational_info: Natural Resource Conservation

lender.name: Duncan
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Serving Christ in any way I can.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.occupation: Owner of a Web Strategy business
lender.loan_because: Sometimes people just need a small break to make great and good changes. It's good to pay it forward too...
lender.occupational_info: I make it easy for the web-wary to have a website and integrate it into their business so that it brings them added value rather than becoming a burden!

lender.name: Goff Family
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. Because we can.

lender.name: JJG
lender.loan_because: i can.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that develops and implements ways to clean up polluted groundwater.

lender.name: Holiday Investments
lender.loan_because: Our family makes donations every year during the holidays and we thought this was a great idea for us in 2007 anad 2008.
lender.occupational_info: All of our family works in Washington, DC: a builder, a teacher, several work for consulting companies, a social worker, and one works for the International Monetary Fund.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: it's a small step closer to an equal opportunity world.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to live in America where opportunity is around every corner.. It's important to give back where you can!

lender.name: Doug and Walker Silsbee
lender.loan_because: This provides us a chance to share our good fortune with others across the world, and to be more connected with our brothers and sisters in other countries.
lender.occupational_info: Walker manages a retreat center, where people gather to learn, to celebrate, to be married. Doug helps teach people in business to be more effective in what they do. His website is http://dougsilsbee.com.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.occupational_info: I'm a software and social entrepreneur. I start, or help to start, companies that develop software and I help develop community outreach programs and organizations as side projects. My community outreach work has mostly consisted of educational programs for under-served predominately minority communities in the United States.

lender.name: Evelyn
lender.loan_because: I wish to "pay it forward."
lender.occupational_info: artist, online activist

lender.name: Cory
lender.loan_because: My father is an entrepreneur, I am an entrepreneur and I want to help give others the great feeling of successfully running a business and we all know cashflow is crucial starting up.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers. Designing websites, usability, administration, testing.

lender.name: Rob Castaneda
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with a beautiful family and have not had to live through war and/or hardship

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: Design radar systems to collect data over Greenland and Antarctic ice sheets so scientists can create better models in predicting future sea level rise

lender.name: BHS Piller Advisory
lender.loan_because: We loan because we would like to invest in small businesses and would like to see them grow. We also like to help others in our global community as we would like help ourselves. We understand the importance of our connection to other communities world wide.
lender.occupational_info: We are students in the 11th grade in Beaverton, Oregon USA

lender.name: Jennifer & Terry
lender.loan_because: It is important for anyone to have access to capital to start their own business and be self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: Jennifer is a Send Out Cards distributor. Terry is an employee of a large wireless mobility company.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: its my responsibility and it grounds me not to complain about things like someone cutting me off or an officemate that irritates me.
lender.occupational_info: I am a social studies teacher in a Social Justice Learning Academy

lender.name: Rhodes College Class
lender.loan_because: We are university students studying international development. We hope to learn more about micro-credit's potential for helping people in developing countries.

lender.name: CDC
lender.loan_because: I haven\'t loaned yet - I\'ve just registered. I\'m looking forward to helping out !
lender.occupational_info: I used to do a lot of comminity based work in past jobs but things changed and now my job requires sitting behind a desk all day ! \r\n\r\nI found the site very interesting and like the idea of being able to support community work half way around the world !

lender.name: Bridgit Jacobsen
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs help sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: I sing and dance with little children!

lender.name: BW Consulting
lender.loan_because: We have a duty to help the world in any and every way we can. Entrepreneurs are the backbone of self-sustaining communities and giving them loans is a great way to start a ripple effect.
lender.occupational_info: Brighter World Consulting LLC helps entrepreneurs become more successful using strategy consulting. We are results-oriented and charge only a percentage of the revenue we generate for our clients. We also ask our clients to donate a percentage of the profits we generate and we match this donation.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: It just makes sense!
lender.occupational_info: I find creative ways to solve business problems with customized software solutions.

lender.name: benjamin
lender.loan_because: \"Every single individual on earth has both the potential and the right to live a decent life. Across cultures and civilizations, Yunus and Grameen Bank have shown that even the poorest of the poor can work to bring about their own development.\" -2006 Nobel Peace Prize press release for Grameen Bank and its founder Muhammed Yunus for their work in microcredit.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I have never seen a program that you can give so little and make such a big difference. I have often wished I could give friends/family/someone money for their business but in the US that means a lot more than I have to freely give. It\'s exciting.
lender.occupational_info: I am a self-employed accountant. My focus has always been on small(under 10 employees) creative businesses. I help these businesses create a system for keeping track of their sales and their expenses. I teach them about taxes and how/when to pay them or I do it for them but I always teach them about this because I think it\'s important. I always teach my clients about what I do because they are often unsure about math/bookkeeping/taxes. I require they always learn how read four reports: A/P, A/R, Profit & Loss and Balance Sheet, even if they never do any of the accounting. I believe this is important to their entreprenurial self-esteem.

lender.name: Miller Family
lender.loan_because: Our family has a tradition each year at Christmas to place an empty box under the Christmas tree (called the \"Jesus box.\") We each put money into the box, and after Christmas we discuss as a family where we\'d like to donate the money. This year we decided to loan our money through Kiva. We love the idea of connecting with individuals thousands of miles away and helping them prosper.
lender.occupational_info: The parents of the family are both teachers. The second generation and their spouses include an engineer, a writer, a pastor, a music therapist, a medical student, a university professor, an industrial designer, and a nursing student. There are currently four members of the third generation, with more expected to follow.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: It's a hand up not a hand out. Kiva offers a unique opportunity for me to see exactly where my money is going. I enjoy selecting specific projects and helping industrious people make their dreams come true. It's a chance to build vibrant, sustainable economies that goes far beyond charity.

lender.name: Stella
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Rob Mowery
lender.loan_because: I believe in the aspect of the world economy and that everyone can get what they really want out of life, by helping enough other people get want they want out of life.
lender.occupational_info: Trying to make the world a little better for everyone.

lender.name: Dale, Jen, Zac & Skylar
lender.occupation: Dale - Sales, Jen - Nurse, Zac & Skylar - Students
lender.loan_because: We loan because we realize the importance of giving back to a world that has given us so much.
lender.occupational_info: Dale sits at a desk and works on a computer all day. Jen is a nurse and provides medical care.

lender.name: Micah
lender.loan_because: It helps people improve their situations.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Wells Fargo Bank, in the Electronic Deposit Center.

lender.name: tom
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage and help any man who needs support to go next step

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I wanted to give my wife a birthday gift that was meaningful. Instead of another material good, I wanted her to know that someone's livelihood was enhanced in her name. In our family, we don't want to take for granted the gifts we have simply because we live in a place like Canada. Pure luck...

lender.name: DEEPAK
lender.loan_because: It gives me plesure that my extra bucks are fulling someones else dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I\'m a consultant as well as contractor with high moral values in work as well as in personal life.

lender.name: Mike D
lender.loan_because: KIVA is an organization where it seems to me that a little contribution can make a big difference; and while it sounds like a cliché, I like the idea of a contribution that "helps people help themselves".
lender.occupational_info: I am a media analyst in a department with a lot of programs intended to help the public. Often they are well-perceived, but occasionally they are not. My work helps the politicans understand what messages they need to change or correct.

lender.name: Kas
lender.loan_because: I'm trying to do my bit...

lender.name: Sylvia & Ralph
lender.loan_because: We make the world a better place a step at a time.
lender.occupational_info: Selling and servicing parts for machines.

lender.name: Remi
lender.loan_because: I feel in this way I can do my little bit to create understanding and compassion between the people in the world
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell shares in companies that are traded on stockexchanges

lender.name: Traavis
lender.loan_because: If I can improve the quality of even one person's life, then I have made a difference.

lender.name: Hugh Cronwright
lender.loan_because: Having spent a lot of time in the Pacific Islands, Africa and Asia, I know well how tough it can be to get a start. How hard people battle to progress. This Kiva Scheme is a small but great step for those who can get the chance to use it.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the area of International Trade. This has been my main career path. Exporting and importing products. Have also served as Executive member of the Export Institute of New Zealand, and Convenor of Judges for the Export Awards.

lender.name: Lucas and Grandad
lender.loan_because: Its a great way to help people from third world countries to improve their living standards. On the selfish front, it feels good to help, and its a great way to teach my Grandson geography, how people from other countries live, finance and compassion.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: it\'s a great way to share with others, and help impoverished people become self sufficient and stand on their own two feet; \"if you give a man a fish, you feed him for a day. but teach a man to fish, and you feed him for his life.\" thanks Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I'm 18, and just graduated from high school. I'm currently taking a "gap year", to travel and learn about the world before I go to college in August. I am very interested in the impact of education, and want to study to learn how to help people and make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Kali
lender.loan_because: there's nothing i own.

lender.name: Tom and Bobbi
lender.loan_because: Not Two is Peace
lender.occupational_info: We operate an international training institute dedicated to the expansion of human awareness.

lender.name: Cheryl & Tim
lender.loan_because: I am humbled by the amazing stories of courage and sacrifice I find here and am honored to have the opportunity to make a difference in someone\'s life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a manager for a company that provided security hardware to the commercial market.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: My wife and I love the idea of micro-loans and have been looking to get into this for quite a number of years. We believe in people in general, and especially believe in people in developing countries who have a lot more drive than those in the so-called developed countries. For very little money (from our point of view), we can then make a huge difference to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs that help the underlying infrastructure of the internet. My wife is a nurse, massage therapist, and a mother (the hardest job of the three).

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed over the years with good fortune. Others have helped me along the way, an d I only trying to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I am a marketing and small business consultant.

lender.name: Pheng
lender.loan_because: Believe in the value and role micro financing plays in a developing economy.

lender.name: Todd and Judith
lender.loan_because: This could really make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Kriss
lender.occupation: Executive Director - Center for Social Innovation

lender.name: Stephen Mucher
lender.loan_because: the possibilities exist.....
lender.occupational_info: I teach and write about the past with a hope that my efforts might modestly inform how we can all live together

lender.name: Justilien Gaspard
lender.loan_because: to help people improve their lives and communities. Hope is the greatest gift anyone can give.

lender.name: Keri
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world. By American standards I\'m on the \"poor\" side, but I know how rich I am. I have a roof over my head, food on my table, and, best of all, a wonderful family. I am happy living a simple life and giving everything I can to causes that are making a difference. Kiva is the best idea to come along in a looong while. I support Kiva because it works! Yay Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I am mostly an artist-in-residence in schools, treatment facilities, etc. I teach Shakespeare, and I do drama therapy with at-risk kids. In my spare time I collect boxes of goods to send to orphanages in Russia (and now Africa) and try to stay informed about issues important to me: eliminating poverty, promoting adoption, supporting human rights across the world.

lender.name: Richard & Mirella
lender.occupation: Web Designer & Nurse for Sick Kids Hospital

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: it seems like a great way to give people a boost toward running self-sustaining businesses in places that need them.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that does research on energy and electricity technologies and business issues.

lender.name: Jenna
lender.loan_because: I would like the people to be successful in their lives.

lender.name: Sabathine
lender.loan_because: I have money I can live without in order to help someone else earn a living.

lender.name: NoVES
lender.occupation: Humanistic Religious Community just outside D.C.
lender.loan_because: We have faith in the ability of humans to make this a more perfect world. We teach our children that deed comes before creed. The Northern Virginia Ethical Society (NoVES) will raise money for our Kiva Basket, and once we get the project organized, the the youth of our Society will manage our portfolio and report periodically to the Society. We hope that the lessons that our youth will learn from this will stand them in good stead for the rest of their lives as their dedication to this activity will benefit others in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Our prime directive is to act so as to bring out the best in others. By so doing we hope to bring out the best in ourselves. We engage our children in a variety of service activities to our community. In that regard, we can extend their experiences of serving to a worldwide community.

lender.name: JoAnn & Jon
lender.loan_because: We care.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I have been in this position myself. .....Just needing a little help to make a dream come true. These entrepreneurs are the people who make the world work for the benefit of us all. Helping people help themselves; there is no better partnership.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I see Kiva as a way to truly change the world. One entrepreneur at a time.

lender.name: Don, Lori & Claire
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance.

lender.name: Filippo Angelini
lender.occupational_info: mechanic

lender.name: Nima
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of business and capital to affect poverty.

lender.name: Thomas Vinther
lender.loan_because: Microloans are very efficient for improving the quality of life in the receiving communities.
lender.occupational_info: Database adminstration of a municipal pipegrid.

lender.name: Katja
lender.loan_because: This is a great opportunity to help people to help themselves.

lender.name: amanda
lender.loan_because: I want others to have some sense of the same financial security I have recently acheived.
lender.occupational_info: I teach art appreciation, art history, and art making to children ages 5-12. I also make small crafts and sell them at markets.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I feel like I can make a very tangible difference here (I also volunteer as an editor). Sometimes I miss that feeling in other parts of my life.

lender.name: Dieter
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I create websites for small businesses and non-profits.

lender.name: Leigh
lender.loan_because: People have certainly helped me out in the past - I want to pass it on, even if I can never be a big financier!
lender.occupational_info: I am first and foremost a single mother of a wonderful eight year-old boy. I also go to work every day, assisting other; In between I read and try to have fun. My life hasn't been easy, but I'm still here!!!

lender.name: Jeffery Gunter
lender.occupation: IT Mgmt - CIO for Financial Institution
lender.loan_because: I believe that God has given me and my family so much that we should share in His blessings.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a small community bank. Technology changes very fast today and my job is to keep the bank up to date with the latest software, hardware and security implementations to keep our records and accounts safe and keep the bad guys out!

lender.name: Elise
lender.loan_because: To be able to connect and hopefully improve the lives of people around the world. The large systems that we have now do not help people out of poverty it keeps them in it and I appreciate the opportunity to be part of the solutions.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I love the personal nature of my help. In the past, I have written about microfinance programs for another international nonprofit and I know how much more can be achieved with the same money when it is loaned and repaid as opposed to simple grants.
lender.occupational_info: I help nonprofit organizations plan their strategies and tell their stories.

lender.name: Veronica
lender.loan_because: I can. This is a very simple way to make a difference and I am happy that I am in a position to make a change.
lender.occupational_info: I sell branding design services to big corporations. When a new product is developed, my agency develop strategies on how to best market that new product as well as designs the packaging for various categories such as food and health & beauty. I am the person who find our clients.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: It is fun to help others to help themselves. Over the years we had many loans for inventory and improvements... everybody can use some help.
lender.occupational_info: Retired... 100% free time. Reading, relaxing, having fun.

lender.name: Marjorie
lender.loan_because: I believe in the transformative power of small actions that can make a large difference in people\'s lives.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the collection of painting and sculpture in a medium-size art museum.

lender.name: Scott & Peg Armstrong
lender.loan_because: we're fortunate enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: We both work in theatre. Scott works as a freelance Audio Engineer and Peg is a general manager for a well known arts in education program.

lender.name: Fred
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I work at a hospital in an X-ray department teaching patients and their families about how we use our skills, machines and medicines to identify and treat diseases.

lender.name: Rick and Katy
lender.loan_because: It is the "next right thing" to do
lender.occupational_info: I help people find travel deals at prices they can afford.

lender.name: JESSE
lender.loan_because: "i get by with a little help from my friends"
lender.occupational_info: an office drone

lender.name: Beverly
lender.loan_because: it is a great way to help others be more self-sufficient.

lender.name: Isabelle
lender.loan_because: everyone should have access to affordable financial services.
lender.occupational_info: I lead The Smart Campaign, a global initiative to keep clients first in microfinance by imbedding core Principles of Client Protection into all aspects of microfinance operations. The Smart Campaign is housed at the Center for Financial Inclusion at ACCION International.

lender.name: Nicky
lender.loan_because: The spirit of the universe moves me, but also the spirit of my friend Tracey. In 2006, first her brother Robyn and then her father were diagnosed with cancer and both have sinced passed away. Tracey is studying economics and environmental geography and intends to work in the non-profit development field when she completes her degree. Her father began life as a farm boy in India before moving to Canada and so in honour of all that her family has gone through this past year, I make my first KIVA loan.
lender.occupational_info: I work at city hall in the office that processes development applications. How much better it is to assist development overseas.

lender.name: Bryan and Cheryl
lender.occupation: church A/V tech and social worker
lender.loan_because: I want to reduce the income discrepancy that exists in the world and help more people become economically self-reliant.
lender.occupational_info: I (Bryan) work at my church and make sure that all of the video, lighting, projection, and sound equipment is working properly and that the personnel using this equipment is well-supported, and my wife (Cheryl) helps teenagers transition from living on the streets to being able to live in an apartment (or better) and to make healthy life choices.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I plan events and trade shows and I play music as well.

lender.name: ross
lender.loan_because: Makes me feel good,and it is easy to do.
lender.occupational_info: Long irregular hours,with great scenery.

lender.name: Iowa Dave
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs a break now and then.

lender.name: Erica & Alex
lender.loan_because: It's awesome and it makes an impact...besides, we have more than enough...it's good to share.

lender.name: Sharon Shelton
lender.loan_because: all are one...

lender.name: Hannah and Eric
lender.loan_because: we want to help them. We use part of our allowance for donations.

lender.name: Ferrell.
lender.loan_because: By giving to these wonderful, hard working people around the world, they give back to the world more than we can ever imagine.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I have the money to do it and there are people out there who don't. This is truly my favorite charity! I really feel like I make a difference here.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I have a passion to assist those poorest of the poor to allieviate from poverty and no longer being poor.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.occupational_info: I provide internal technical support for a financial institution as well as act as project manager for several major system implementations.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: My sister gave $$ in my name for a loan to KIVA recipients. She has done this sort of thing for the past few years and it is my favorite type of present--giving to those less fortunate than we! Our family seems a lot happier taking materialism out of the holidays. I am now earning a little myself and will add to the original amount as my business income allows.
lender.occupational_info: I rent a guest suite to visitors to my town.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I really believe in the 'Ripple Effect.' By doing something so small I can have a big impact in another person's life. It makes me happy.

lender.name: Keith & Parker
lender.loan_because: To help people.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I believe each of us can make a difference. I especially like to give a hand to those who are trying hard to support themselves and their families. All they may need is for someone to give them a break. Kiva helps me reach across the world to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer with Habitat for Humanity London. Previously I worked in Telecom in Canada.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: This is an exciting, fulfilling way to lend money and feel connected with others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Heroes@Work helps leaders in all aspects of business learn how to find creative ways of serving humanity and making a positive difference while also building a successful business. Kiva people are Heroes at Work!

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I\'m starting my own business in Canada and I know how important it is to have financial support for one\'s dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am starting a new magazine.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: A portion of my funds can go a long, long way to help people improve the lives of themselves, their families, and communities. It is NOT a handout.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small company that works with - engages - the employees of 25+ sized companies to create solutions to the business problems that face the company - find ways to be faster, more profitable, and fun!

lender.name: Erick Micheal
lender.loan_because: bueno presto para ampliar mi negocio, actualmente tengo un negocio de ventas x internet y lo que me falta es capital,ya que cuento con muy poko, para comprar mercaderia y seguir vendiendo.y de esta manera seguir pagandome los estudios en la universidad.Ya que yo mismo solvento mis gastos.
lender.occupational_info: Bueno, mi megocio, consta de promocionar en internet, a travez de una pagina de mi pais, articulos como accesorios de celulares, fundas, carcasas,baterias. las personas me contactan x internet y las entregas las hago a domicilio

lender.name: Audrey
lender.loan_because: Life can be unfair, so I believe in correcting the imbalances in whatever way I can.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: I\'ve always wanted to be a venture capitalist! :-) Seriously, how can you say no?
lender.occupational_info: I go to school full time and work at a law firm part-time. I\'m studying international law and hope to be able to travel to some of these loan countries one day.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: Why shouldn't I? Its nice to help other people succeed.

lender.name: David Stallard
lender.loan_because: Those to whom much is given, much will be required.
lender.occupational_info: Platinum Apps is an independent software developer of applications for mobile operating systems, specialising primarily in applications for iOS (iPhone & iPad) and Android operating systems, but also offering solutions across other mobile platforms.

lender.name: McDuffs
lender.occupational_info: I am developing a software program for residential subcontractors (plumbers, electricians, etc.). My wife is a council facilitator (council is a practice of speaking and listening from the heart through compassionate, heartfelt expression and empathic, non-judgmental listening).

lender.name: Cathy
lender.occupation: Representative of a ladies service club
lender.loan_because: Living in a foreign country, we see many who are here struggling to make a living. We want to be able to help others to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We are members of an international sorority called Beta Sigma Phi. We live in Dhahran, Saudi Arabia. Part of our organizational goals is to give to charitable causes.

lender.name: Adeline
lender.loan_because: every little helps

lender.name: antonia
lender.loan_because: i feel that even though people give loans mostly to African people its still a country that has big needs thats why i loaned
lender.occupational_info: I\\\'m a student and i am just about to go to secondary school and my favourite subjects are Art and English my hobbies are Dance and Horses.\\r\\n

lender.name: Anne and Keith
lender.loan_because: We were given a gift certificate
lender.occupational_info: We are both retired now; I was a trainer for the UK govt, and my wife was a teacher.

lender.name: Adele
lender.loan_because: it creates unlimited possibities.
lender.occupational_info: I work with teams to improve the way we provide health care.

lender.name: Pauline
lender.loan_because: My daughter\'s enthusiasm for Kiva rubbed off on me. I also want to help those who need a start in life.
